data.name: QC_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
data.value: Nice work I must say. You shall be my pupil from now on!

data.name: QC_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
data.value: You did it! Now my old pupil can rest in peace. His necklace shall be yours.

data.name: QC_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
data.value: Mhmhm.. those are good! What? Aah.. the key.. I've actually still had one. There you go.

data.name: QC_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
data.value: Thank you! You're such a cutie!

data.name: QC_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
data.value: Thank you, thank you! *cheers*

data.name: QC_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
data.value: You've slain the evil that was corrupting us? Yes .. I already feel relieved. Thank you. Thaaaank you! You are our hero! I want you to remember this song, so we can see each other anytime.

data.name: QC_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
data.value: It's so silent outside. Have my brothers found peace?

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
data.value: Exactly what I needed. I hope I didn't make you too much trouble.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
data.value: Ooohh oooo. That's so cute from you! Thank you. Thaaanks! -hugs-

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
data.value: Wow. Nice. But the evil still lurks inside the tombs ...

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
data.value: Yee ha! You're just awesome.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
data.value: You're our hero! Now me and my brother can venture inside the tombs too.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
data.value: ... you've survived ... impressive!

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
data.value: Heureka! Thanks.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
data.value: You brought me mushrooms? What mushrooms? Why? Ohhhhh ... the Ghost Mushrooms! Great! Now I can make the potion for Milly!

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_HungryKid
data.value: Yipiii! Thank you.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_MeetBilly
data.value: Hello there. My dad sent you to me? ... ... grr ... Why are you doing this to me dad? ... grr ... You should know that you're the third that comes to get his reward -just this week-.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
data.value: Where did you get this letter? Did you read it? ... Boy boy. This will get complicated for you. You'll now work for us.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TalkToBillyAboutMilly
data.value: You are accusing me of beating my younger sister? ... WHAT THE HELL IS YOUR PROBLEM? THIS IS NOT YOUR PROBLEM. ... Feel free to bother my mother and father with this. But please just go now and do your work.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
data.value: Nicely done. Thanks for the portrait! Your reward? ... hmph ... I guess I really have to give you something now. You can have this relic of mine, as I don't need it anymore.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
data.value: You've done as I said? Very well. Listen boy. I warn you, don't do the ritual again.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
data.value: Thanks thanks thanks thanks! You've saved me! Have you met my mother before? She has a small camp in the far north east.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheNiceFather
data.value: Awww. That's too kind of you for helping me out.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheNotSoNiceMother
data.value: ... It was moms order to let Billy beat me ... ?! :'(

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheRouteOfDin
data.value: Yes, yes. I'm Maja! My younger brothers sent you ..? I'm glad that they are are okay.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheSister
data.value: Why, hello there! Waaaah... my brother sent you ..? o_o

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
data.value: Hah! It seems dad has finally sent someone who could finish our work in the woods. Your reward shall be ... I've got more for you to do!

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
data.value: Nice nice. Good work I must say.

data.name: QC_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
data.value: Very well. This should do it. Ehehehe ...

data.name: QD_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
data.value: Ghost Buster Karl told me I could become a Ghost Buster if I show him what I can do.

data.name: QD_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
data.value: Ghost Buster Karl wants me to avenge his old pupil by killing the redish ghost. I can have a ghost necklace if I manage kill the ghost.

data.name: QD_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
data.value: The goron inside the hut will craft me a black key if I bring him what he needs.

data.name: QD_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
data.value: Maja wants me to buy her some Chicken Feed from the Travelling Salesman that recently arrived in Route of Din.

data.name: QD_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
data.value: Maja in the Route of Din wants me to secure her chickens by securing the area.

data.name: QD_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
data.value: The route of din is turning into a place of madness. I must figure out the cause of this change. I should return to Maja if I have any new information.

data.name: QD_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
data.value: The goron inside the hut can't take it that his brothers have gone mad. Maybe I should help him out...

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
data.value: The strange old man wants me to find him 3 empty bottles. He said that the skeletons to the south may have some.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
data.value: The yoyo child-doll has been heavily abused. It'll be required to replace some parts of it. Maybe I should fire up my Magical Bottle! 5x Fabric + 1x Red Dye should fix it. I wrote the crafting recipes into my Recipe List.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
data.value: The older kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to make the tombs a safer place.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
data.value: The older kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to make the tombs a safer place again. This time I should hunt the female demons.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
data.value: The older kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to attack the evil at its roots. The demon master must die.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
data.value: Boy Billy wants me to clear the fields to the west of him.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
data.value: The strange old man wants me to bring him 5 fresh leaves for his medicine. They can be found just north of him.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
data.value: The old woman in the north-east of the Tia Woods wants me to bring her 4 Ghost Mushrooms. She indicated that I might want to visit the Hyrule Rivers to the east of the woods.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_HungryKid
data.value: The younger kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to bring him some fish. He's hungry!

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_MeetBilly
data.value: The old man told me that I'd have to meet his son Billy if I want a reward for my help. He thinks that Billy can be found somewhere to the south.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
data.value: I should deliver the unsealed letter to this so called mother. Maybe she got something to say regarding its very strange content. The skeletons are supposed to follow the orders of Billy?!

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TalkToBillyAboutMilly
data.value: Billy seems to beating his younger sister. I really should speak with him.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
data.value: Billy wants me to bring him the portrait of his father. It's somewhere in the Tombs of his family. I can find the tombs in the south east of the Tia Woods.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
data.value: The old witch in the north east of the Tia Woods wants me to perform the fire ritual at the ritual place somewhere in the south west of the Tia Woods. To perform the ritual I must simply lit the fires in the right pattern.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
data.value: Milly, the sister of Billy, wants me to bring her the secret-map of the family tombs. She said that the map would be somewhere in the woods north-east of her, guarded by razor blades.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheNiceFather
data.value: The father of Milly assured me that he's going to talk with Billy about Milly. I better bring Milly the good news.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheNotSoNiceMother
data.value: I've spoken with Milly's mother about Billy beating her. I should really talk with Milly about all this.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheRouteOfDin
data.value: The boys at the stone tombs in the Tia Woods want me to travel to the Route of Din to meet their older sister Maja. The entrance to the Route of Din can be found in the north west of the Tia Woods.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheSister
data.value: Billy wants me to speak with his sister. She can be found somewhere to the south of him.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
data.value: Billy wants me to revenge his family by hunting the Skeletons in the Tia Woods.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
data.value: Billy requires my help once more! This time I should bring him 25 Skeleton Bones and slay some of those red skeletons.

data.name: QD_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
data.value: The old woman in the north-eastern parts of the Tia Woods wants me to bring her Keese Tooths and Wings.

data.name: QNC_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
data.value: Do ghosts scare you?

data.name: QNC_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
data.value: Slay the red Ghost King ..! And try to not get eaten alive.

data.name: QNC_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
data.value: Still waiting.. for the required materials. Be quick about it! The hunger is eating me up alive.

data.name: QNC_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
data.value: You don't want my chickens to hunger, do you?

data.name: QNC_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
data.value: You must save my poor chickens!

data.name: QNC_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
data.value: Every day more of my chickens get mad .. -sobs-

data.name: QNC_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
data.value: Oh, oh. Their sounds ... why ... please help me ..!

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
data.value: I really need those bottles before I can make my medicine. Hurry!

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
data.value: Don't be too shy to say that the tombs scare you. You don't have to go inside ... just stay here with us.

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
data.value: They'll try to seduce you. Watch out.

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
data.value: You MUST help us. Please. If we don't stop the evil now it will spread over all Tia Woods.

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
data.value: Why have you not completed your quest yet? Scared ... hehe ... ?!

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
data.value: Hurry! Bring me the leaves. There are some north-west of here.

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
data.value: Mushrooms from Ghosts. I need!

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_HungryKid
data.value: Huuuuuuuuuuuuuuungry. Me want fish! FISH.

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
data.value: Get me this portrait at all costs.

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
data.value: What are you waiting for? Don't just stand there.

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
data.value: Pleeeeeeeeeeeeeease help me to find the map! Or my brother will ...

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
data.value: What's taking so long? Come on try harder! Do it for your friend Billy! Or the reward, THE reward!

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
data.value: Scared of the Red Skeletons? Muahahah aa... !

data.name: QNC_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
data.value: What are you waiting for? Hunt those bats for their wings and tooths!

data.name: QN_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
data.value: The Ghost Hunt

data.name: QN_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
data.value: The Evil Ghost

data.name: QN_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
data.value: Black Key Craft

data.value: Wanted! Green Skeletons

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
data.value: The Broken Yoyo Doll

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
data.value: The Tombs

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
data.value: The Tombs - Part 2

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
data.value: The Tombs - Part 3

data.value: Clear The Fields

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
data.value: Fresh Leaves

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_HungryKid
data.value: Hungry Fish Kid

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_MeetBilly
data.value: Meet Billy

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
data.value: Murder Letter

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TalkToBillyAboutMilly
data.value: Talk to Billy about Milly

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
data.value: The Family Portrait

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
data.value: The Fire Ritual

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
data.value: The Lost Map

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheNiceFather
data.value: The Nice Father

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheNotSoNiceMother
data.value: The Not So Nice Mother

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheRouteOfDin
data.value: The Route of Din

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheSister
data.value: The Sister

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
data.value: The Skeleton Hunt

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
data.value: The Skeleton Hunt Continues

data.name: QN_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
data.value: Toxic Preparations

data.name: QS_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
data.value: Hey you! Come here and listen! I've just lost my pupil to one of those ghosts. I'll make you my new student if you show me what you can do. For starters simply kill 12 ghosts. Hehehe. Some day you may become a great ghost buster - just like me.

data.name: QS_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
data.value: My last pupil was killed by the Ghost King that lives deep in the woods of Hyrule Rivers. Now go and avenge him. If you succeed then you can have his old ghost necklace.

data.name: QS_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
data.value: Have you seen the black block? We've sealed the pathway beyond. If you bring me 1x Goron Steel and 3x Goron Croisants, then I can craft you a key to open it. Especially the Croisants are important! They should be around here somewhere..

data.name: QS_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
data.value: Wait, a sec. The travelling salesman has recently arrived! Could you get me some Chicken Feed? Please!

data.name: QS_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
data.value: The evil Blood Keeses that have appeared last month eat my poor little baby chickens! And some of the older chickens turned -all- mad after they have been bitten. We must figure out this mystery! Bring me a few feathers of the mad chickens, and on the way slay some of those Bloody Keeses!

data.name: QS_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
data.value: These lands are changing and you must stop it ... before everyone turns completely mad. You seem like a strong fighter. Please figure out what is going wrong.

data.name: QS_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
data.value: Oh dear, my beloved brothers have gone mad! I'm so sorry that someone innocent like you has to see this. But I can't take this anymore. Please ...

data.name: QS_StoneTombs_Wanted_Skeletons
data.value: WANTED: Any adventurer with courage to slay atleast 10 green skeletons.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
data.value: What..? You want your answers now? Boy, first - I've forgotten my medicine bottles at home. And I really need them. Bring me some from the Skeletons to the south.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
data.value: As you inspect the doll you can clearly see that it is broken. If one could just repair it... 5x Fabric + 1x Red Dye should do it. To create Red Dye I will need 1x Small Empty Bottle + 2x Skeleton Bone Powder + 5x Red Potion.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
data.value: Hey you! How did you get here? I think some strange boy sent us here ... I really can't remember. Do you see the entrance next to me? That's the entrance to the Family Stone Tombs. Just recently it was overrun by monsters. You look rather strong. Can't you help us out and make the place a bit safer? Those green skeletons scare us ...

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
data.value: An even greater evil than some skeletons has infested the tombs. And my feeling tells me that they will leave the tombs soon. Just don't tell my younger brother~. He'd be scared to death! All I can tell you is that they are evil, eat fish and are female! Get them!!

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
data.value: I have one last wish from you. Attack the evil at its roots by slaying the master demon. You shall have my Hyrule Boots if you succeed.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
data.value: Hey you. Do you want to work for me? Of course you do. I'm Billy. Everyone wants to help me. Anyway I need you to do some work for me. I need the fields to the west to be cleared of those skeletons and skeleton heads. I may give you a reward. Just go! Or are you too scared?

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
data.value: Why, hello there too. You are asking what is going on? Well.. I won't tell you... until you bring me 5 fresh leaves for my daily medicine! There should be some just north of here. Would you be so nice?

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
data.value: Hello hello! Do you hear me? Can't you just simply bring me 4 Ghost Mushrooms? Yes, yes. You should be able to find some at the Hyrule Rivers. *coughs* No need to get wet just yet. Simply cross the bridge in the far south east. *coughs*

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_HungryKid
data.value: Hey you. Do you have some food for me? I mean.. some fish. I want fish! Any fish! Come please bring me some. Don't you smell the fish from the tombs?

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_MeetBilly
data.value: About your questions... I actually... don't know. Sorry. But thanks anyway. Go talk to my son, Billy and he will give you a reward for your work. He should be somewhere to the South.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
data.value: You break the seal of the letter and read: ............... Dear mother, I hope this letter reaches you quickly. Those skeletons are just too stupid to follow orders. I've sent two more 'adventurers' to the family tombs. The demon master will be -very- happy with us. Now back to the case with my little sister Milly. Have you managed to create the potion for her? I'd help you but I'm just too busy. Your Billy <3.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TalkToBillyAboutMilly
data.value: Now that you've brought me the map my brother won't hurt me. Billy is such an acerb brother. Why?? :'((

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
data.value: The tombs of my family are hidden in the south east of Tia Woods. Go there and find me the portrait of my father. If you do that then I'll forget about our little quarrel.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
data.value: Boy boy. I now want you to find the ritual place to the far south west. Perform the fire ritual by simply litting the fires in the right pattern. Do what I say or you'll face the consequences.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
data.value: Hello stranger! Nice to meet you! I'm Milly, the future princess of these lands. You've helped my dear brother Billy? Oh dear ... my brother ... He has been acting strangely lately. And now he wants the secret-map of the family tombs back! He'll hurt me again if I don't bring the map back. :'( The map is somewhere in the woods, guarded by those razor blades. Please, please bring it to me!

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheNiceFather
data.value: Hello. Who's there? Oh, you the young fighter. Your deeds already reached my kind ears. What do you say? Billy seems to beat poor Milly? Hmm ... You must know that we must train her to endure all physical and mental stress. Anyway, I'm going to talk with Billy about Milly. Beating her is indeed too much.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheNotSoNiceMother
data.value: Hello hello! You must speak louder or I won't hear you! ... Yes. I am the mother of Milly. And it's known to me that Billy beats Milly. It was my order after all. Be gone now.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheRouteOfDin
data.value: Phew, thanks again for your help. I fear that our older sister Maja is in trouble too! She has been protecting our chickens. You may find her near the Route of Din in the far north west. Hey, take this key. It will allow you to leave this island quickly! Please, help our sister!

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheSister
data.value: Hey, don't just run off. If you havn't spoken to my sister yet.. You will help her too. She should be hiding somewhere to the south.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
data.value: My family owns large parts of the Tia Woods. All was great until the skeletons came and most of our workers fled. Those bastards! Your next quest shall be to avenge me and my family. Hunt those skeletons like you've never hunted something else before! Your reward is near ..! Oh, and before I forget it ... if you see my lil' sister - tell her to HURRY.

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
data.value: Hey again. More work before we're finished. First, you must bring me at least 25 Skeleton Bones. I need them to make Skeleton Dust. Oh, and slay some Red Skeletons on your way, alright?

data.name: QS_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
data.value: Hmpf.. I've indeed ran out of Keese Wings and Tooths. Go out and hunt some of those bats for me.

data.name: QuestGoalDesc_GetItem
data.value: Get {0}! Got {1} of 1.

data.name: QuestGoalDesc_GetItems
data.value: Get {0}s! Got {1} of {2}.

data.name: QuestGoalDesc_KillEnemies
data.value: Hunt {0}s! Killed {1} of {2}.

data.name: QuestGoalDesc_KillEnemy
data.value: Hunt {0}! Killed {1} of 1.
